column3: Go to the DOAJ admin Journals and Articles search at /admin/admin_site_search
Open the "Journals vs Articles" facet and select "Journals"

column4: Only journals are visible in the search results

column3: Open the In DOAJ facet, and select "False"

column4: None of the journal titles in the search results are links
All the journal titles in the search results are links
You are taken to the DOAJ ToC page for this journal

column3: Click back (twice) in your browser window to go back to the search results
Click on the "journal" URL for a journal result

column4: You are taken to the Journal's home page

column3: Click back in your browser to go back to the search results

column4: You are taken to the relevant page on a journal's website

column3: Click back in your browser to go back to the search results

column4: A new browser window opens containing the edit form for the journal
